messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Desk
messages.body: Good evening crew, i hope we all get rich and shit. I mgoing to be sellign the armoury for more space dosh. So yeah. Also im planning on hosting a pizza party after all the money we've amalgamated. Suit sensors, have fun and good luck departments.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hello  crew, thanks to our valliant efforts we have grossed 10642 Credits. I may have also sold confidential files. Meh, it's not like people read them anyway right...? Bush did 911.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Bee's are cool, bee's are hip, please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The chaple is now modern art, you have no authorisation to shut it down. Doing this will msot likely cause more problems than it is worh. If you feel like contributing you have my praise.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a horde of squeaking things have descended into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
